A "fruity" odor in the urine suggests the presence of ketone bodies. These are produced when the body uses up all available insulin and needs to lower dangerous glucose levels.It is a hallmark of diabetes.You require a blood test known as an hba1C, as well as a fasting glucose test and/or an insulin clamp protocol.Losing weight should be a number one priority.
You definitely need labs and a urinalysis.  (CBC, CMP, Liver Profile, HbgA1C) for starts.It does sounds suspicious of Diabetes.
